channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Officials issue warning as beloved vegetables vanish from markets: 'There are serious concerns'

item.title: Artists turning trash into masterpieces
item.description: As climate concerns take center stage, repurposed art is getting more wall space and less side-eye from the art world. Itay Hod reports.

item.title: Door-knock prank leaves 10-year-old boy shot, homeowner detained
item.description: A 10-year-old Houston boy was shot and critically injured when he allegedly attempted a door-knocking prank on a neighbor house, police said.
